Package oracle.kubernetes.operator

The main classes for the Oracle WebLogic Server Kubernetes Operator.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DomainProcessor  
    DomainProcessorDelegate
    A set of underlying services required during domain processing.
    PodAwaiterStepFactory  
    ProcessingConstants
    Constants used in asynchronous processing.
    TuningParameters  
    WebLogicConstants  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigMapWatcher
    This class handles ConfigMap watching.
    DomainPresence  
    DomainProcessorImpl  
    DomainStatusUpdater
    Updates for status of Domain.
    DomainWatcher
    This class handles Domain watching.
    EventWatcher
    This class handles Domain watching.
    JobWatcher
    Watches for Jobs to become Ready or leave Ready state.
    Main
    A Kubernetes Operator for WebLogic.
    OperatorLiveness
    This task maintains the "liveness" indicator so that Kubernetes knows the Operator is still alive.
    PodWatcher
    Watches for Pods to become Ready or leave Ready state.
    ServerStatusReader
    Creates an asynchronous step to read the WebLogic server state from a particular pod.
    ServiceWatcher
    This class handles Service watching.
    TuningParameters.CallBuilderTuning  
    TuningParameters.MainTuning  
    TuningParameters.PodTuning  
    TuningParameters.WatchTuning  
    TuningParametersImpl  
    Workarounds
    This class lists bugs in libraries that require workarounds.

Package oracle.kubernetes.operator Description

The main classes for the Oracle WebLogic Server Kubernetes Operator.
